name: graph-server
description: Hosts various information on all public transport in the island

scripts.dev: concurrently "SET NODE_ENV=development&&  SET PORT=3000 && nodemon --inspect ./bin/www" " cd transit-app && SET PORT=3001 && yarn start"
scripts.build: cd transit-app && yarn build && cd .. && xcopy /e/h/y/q "transit-app/build" "react-app\" > nul 2>&1 && del "react-app\app.html" > nul 2>&1 && ren "react-app\index.html" "app.html"

author: Daniel Nelson
